title: be fitted with a fire alarm device, if it is either a high-rise, high- use or a special building so
clause_text: be fitted with a fire alarm device, if it is either a high-rise, high- use or a special building so as to ensure its prompt evacuation;

source_pdf.text_snippet: be fitted with a fire alarm device, if it is either a high-rise, high- use or a special building so as to ensure its prompt evacuation;
